div.p: Topographic map of the eastern Himalayan region including all elevations between 2 000 and 4 000 m.a.s.l.; the altitudinal range of Elliot's laughing thrush ( Garrulax elliotii) . The species' range is indicated by the thin dashed line as in [ 110]. Sampling locations are indicated by the abbreviation of each population's name (Table 1). The bold dashed line represents the boundary between recognized ecological subregions of the eastern Himalayan mountain range [ 20]. Insert: The shaded area represents the study region.
